error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Modbus/Rest shim server
error.too_many_zones: Too many zones specified, maximum is 48
error.too_many_mixg: Too many mixed groups specified, maximum is 3
error.too_many_dehumidificators: Too many dehumidificators specified, maximum is 9
error.invalid_dehumidificator_index: Invalid dehumidificator index specified, valid indexes are between 1 and 9
error.too_many_extra_pump: Too many pumps specified, maximum is 5
error.invalid_pump_index: Invalid pump index specified, valid indexes are between 1 and 5

data.climate_system_name: Show name of the Climate Control System
data.neasmart_gw_server_host: Address of the server running the Modbus/REST interface
data.neasmart_gw_server_port: REST port of the server running the Modbus/REST interface
data.zones: Comma separated list of the zones to configure
data.mixed_groups: Number of Mixed Groups to configure
data.dehumidificators_regs_mapping: Comma separated list of registers addresses mapping to Dehumidificators
data.pumps_regs_mapping: Comma separated list of registers addresses mapping to Pumps
